Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Array of row-wise data or a single row. Change using msg.payload.

Array of labels for series. Change using msg.labels.

Array of colors for series, names or #rrggbb. Change using msg.colors.

Array to assign series to 'left' or 'right' axis. Change using msg.axes.

Array of stroke widths for series, default is 2. Change using msg.widths.

Array of bool to show points on lines. Change using msg.points.

Array of bool to span over nulls, default is false. Change using msg.span_gaps.

Unit to label left axis. Change using msg.left_unit.

Minimum for left axis. Change using msg.left_min.

Maximum for left axis. Change using msg.left_max.

Decimals on left axis. Change using msg.left_decimals.

Use SI prefix on left axis. Change using msg.left_isoprefix.

Use log scale on left axis. Change using msg.left_log.

Unit to label right axis. Change using msg.right_unit.

Minimum for right axis. Change using msg.right_min.

Maximum for right axis. Change using msg.right_max.

Decimals on right axis. Change using msg.right_decimals.

Use SI prefix on right axis. Change using msg.right_isoprefix.

Use log scale on right axis. Change using msg.right_log.

Reverse legend order. Change using msg.reverse_legend.
